name: Endurance (itch) (Silicontent)
description:
Welcome to Endurance!

In this simple game, you only goal is to weave your way between enemies as they try their best to get you! Use your trusty speed boost power-up when it's ready to blast your way through the enemies to rack up your score.

To move, use WASD or the arrow keys. Press SPACE to speed up when the cooldown is at zero.

----------------------------------------------------------

ENDURANCE is a remake of a game I created in Pygame of the same name. It was a simple project I worked on during school, but I wanted to expand on it a little and remake it in an actual game engine. So, here we are. To view the original Pygame source code (if you want your eyes to bleed), check out the repository on my GitHub page.

GitHub| Website | YouTube
